item.title: UGC Video - Mental Health Supplement Review! - Upwork
item.description:
UGC Creator for Calming Supplement

Are you passionate about health and wellness? Do you love sharing products that make a real difference in people's lives? We have an exciting opportunity just for you!

We're a brand that created a natural mental health supplement helping people improve mental wellbeing and calm down using all natural ingredients scientifically proven to help reduce stress, anxiety, and depression.

What’s in it for you?
Free Product: Receive our premium supplement at no cost!
Content Creation: Showcase your creativity with an authentic video review.
Affiliate Partnership: Earn generous commissions by promoting a product you believe in (more details to be discussed)

Why Partner with Us?
️Quality You Can Trust: Our supplements are made with high-quality, natural ingredients that help improve mental wellbeing
️ Positive Impact: Help your followers discover significant improvements in mental health
️ Collaborative Growth: Join a community of like-minded influencers passionate about wellness.

Looking for...

NOTE: YOU SHOULD SOUND LIKE A REAL HAPPY CUSTOMER

Selfie style video showing yourself with the product and a review sharing the effects of the supplement including:

1) What was life before the supplement
2) What it was like when you took it (taste, effects, etc.)
3) How it has improved and changed your life

Some examples of reviews I like:
https://www.tiktok.com/@sedona.ugc/video/7286828565306412330
https://www.tiktok.com/@taylorgholz/video/7382651723749379358
https://www.tiktok.com/@devincastell/video/7273128505284807982

Ready to join us on this journey? Send me a message

If all goes well, we have a very popular partnership program that gets you paid for every sale you bring in, as well as any other partners you introduce to the program.

Let me know if that still sounds interesting and we can talk further! Please send UGC portfolio if you can!


Posted On: June 29, 2024 20:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Promotional Video, UGC, MP4, MOV, Testimonial Video, Branding & Marketing, Video Editing, Brand Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Promotional Video, UGC, MP4, MOV, Testimonial Video, Branding & Marketing, Video Editing, Brand Marketing, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: High Quality YouTube Video Editor for Influencer Career - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative YouTube video editor to join our team and help enhance our influencer career. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and polishing our YouTube videos to make them visually appealing, engaging, and professional. Your role will involve cutting and arranging footage, adding transitions, graphics, and effects, improving audio quality, and ensuring the final output meets our high standards.

   Requirements:
   - Strong proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Ability to cut and arrange footage to create a compelling narrative
   - Knowledge of adding transitions, graphics, and effects to enhance the visual appeal
   - Experience in improving audio quality and synchronization
   - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

   This is a small-sized project that will last under 1 month. The ideal candidate will have an intermediate level of expertise in video editing and a strong portfolio showcasing their previous work.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 19:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Video Editor / Manager to Promote YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, we are looking for a TikTok Video Creator & Manager to promote our YouTube channel.

The channel is about 2 friends trying to build an Epic Castle in Southern Florida, it's a race against time, money and everything else that comes along.

Job Description:
Your job will be to take our current content and edit it into engaging TikTok videos, then post them on TikTok. Your goal is to attract viewers from TikTok and convert them into subscribers and viewers of our YouTube channel. The highest-performing videos on TikTok will also be repurposed as YouTube Shorts.

Responsibilities:
Create a large volume of high-quality TikTok videos quickly
Understand what content gets views on TikTok
Continuously analyze TikTok analytics to understand what’s working and what’s not
Track and demonstrate your results

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating viral TikTok videos
Strong understanding of TikTok trends and algorithms
Ability to work quickly and efficiently
Experience in using analytics to drive content strategy
Ability to repurpose content effectively across platforms

Other Requirements:
Must Have Strong Work Ethics and Be Honest
Must be a teamplayer (we will as team)
Ideally you are passionate about the
This will start as a part time but can turn into full-time.

You can view our YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/@AmericanCastle

About Us:
We are just hustling for our lives to make this project happen and we will do it against all odds.

We are producing a one-of-a-kind television show following two friends, Curt and Peter, as they attempt to build a real castle in Southern Florida. This is no ordinary renovation project – it's a battle against permits, a race against the clock, and a test of friendship.

Our show offers a raw and exciting look at the challenges and triumphs of building a massive structure, set against the backdrop of Southern Florida’s vibrant culture. This show will be unlike anything you've seen before on TV or YouTube.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 19:51 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, YouTube Development, Video Editing, YouTube, TikTok Video
Skills: TikTok, YouTube Development, Video Editing, YouTube, TikTok Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for Crypto Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey my name is Crypto Andy I am looking for editors for my channel. Go to the link below and subscribe to my channel. Watch the video to see if you can creat qualitif of that kind. 60 dollar is set for a video of 11 min. Some will be shorter than that.

https://youtu.be/6WMVkRfOB3o?si=tcG8oEmMI2TCyWIR

I need someone that be reliable my last editor netted 1000 after working for a little over a year. I am looking for someone or 2 who can edit that level quality. I need some I can trust that is responsive. I need the video in a week time frame with one edit. They come out weekly.

Only subscribed editor will be hired.
Like I said I need someone who can be responsive an deliver on time. If not yes u will not receive future work.

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 29, 2024 19:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Production, Videography
Country: United States

Amro

item.title: Looking For a Video Editor For Bodybuilding Faceless Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Please read this carefully before applying for this job.*

The ideal candidate/team will have worked on YouTube automation channels before with measurable success, have extensive knowledge of Youtube guidelines/copyright rules/fair use policies, strong editing skills and access to Stock Footage sites as well as experience with and use of VidIQ or Tubebuddy. Videos must be able to be monetized.

We Want to Work With You If:
- You have experience in producing bingeable content with Youtube.
- You understand how to keep viewers engaged with good pacing, transitions etc.
- You have experience working under tight deadlines
- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions.
- You are organized, communicative and has fast turnaround times.
- You can deliver items via (Google Drive/Monday.com/Trello/asana)
- You have a sense of humor
- Have experience in the Bodybuilding Niche

Video requirements:
- Video workflow: 10 second bait intro, channel intro, follow IG/subscribe pop ups, and then keep the content in the body edited in a way that is funny, engaging and entertaining.  Ending with channel end screens.
- Add in copyright free sound effects/background music where applicable, not in excess.
- Source and use copyright free clips and have stock footage access to use licensed clips.
- Edit the video in a bingeable type style that is captivating to the audience, CTR and retention rate focused, 1080p HD+, make use of lower-thirds/text/transitions where applicable. Professional video editing software only - Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve or Final Cut Pro.

Write “123” At the start of your post so i see you have read this full description and you pay attention to detail

Why we are awesome to work with:
- You'll fill your portfolio with a variety of professional video samples
- We have high-quality standards, which means awesome training – you'll learn a ton
- Work from wherever you want (as long as we can reach you)
- There is PLENTY of work to go around, and no cap on what you can edit
- We recognize talent and promote from within
- Kickass bonuses and incentives

Job requirements:
- 2-3 videos per week
- 8 minutes + videos
- $25 per video

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 29, 2024 19:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics, Videography, YouTube Development
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics, Videography, YouTube Development
Country: Hungary
click to apply
